title: The Discovery of a late and bloody conspiracie at Edenburg in Scotland related in a letter sent to Mr. Pym and the rest of the committes of the House of Commons / from the Committes of Scotland, Octob. 14, 1641, and read in the House of Commons assembled Octob. 20 ; with the names of those lords that should have bin slaine ; and the names of the conspirators.
author: Armyne, William, Sir, 1593-1651.
